2811723672.name: P-2 Peacemaker
2811723672.description: The SEAF standard pistol - offering a high fire rate, generous capacity, and fast reloading.

3981773112.name: P-19 Redeemer
3981773112.description: A fully-automatic pistol with an extremely high fire rate, allowing for efficient crowd control.

1374036584.name: P-4 Senator
1374036584.description: A high-damage revolver, which can be reloaded with single rounds. A heavy-hitting and reliable sidearm.

2501707184.name: LAS-7 Dagger
2501707184.description: A laser pistol that fires a continuous beam. Does not require ammo but can overheat and need to change batteries.

2797735596.name: GP-31 Grenade Pistol
2797735596.description: A pistol that fires grenades. Must be reloaded between shots.

1938200223.name: P-113 Verdict
1938200223.description: The gas-operated, semiautomatic P-113 chambers the 14mm 'Rapid Deliberation,' the largest centerfire cartridge of any magazine-fed pistol.

2264358800.name: SG-22 Bushwhacker
2264358800.description: A triple-barreled, break-action, sawed-off shotgun. Switch firing modes to fire all three barrels at once.

2340232366.name: P-72 Crisper
2340232366.description: A compact handgun-style flamethrower, able to project a jet of fire over short distances.

1084288106.name: P-11 Stim Pistol
1084288106.description: Fires a ballistic dart at near-supersonic speeds, allowing the user to stim allies from a distance. Might sting.

1902682578.name: PLAS-15 Loyalist
1902682578.description: A plasma pistol that charges each shot until the trigger is released. Plasma projectiles explode on impact.

905.name: CQC-19 Stun Lance
905.description: A melee weapon tipped with electrified prongs that temporarily stun targets. Can be wielded one-handed.

1007.name: GP-31 Ultimatum
1007.description: A pistol front-loaded with a single, powerful explosive. The weight of the projectile limits the weapon's range.

1110.name: LAS-58 Talon
1110.description: An accurate, hard-hitting laser revolver with bespoke break action for heat sink swaps.

1207.name: CQC-2 Sabre
1207.description: A one-handed ceremonial sword suitable for use in parades, sabrage, and combat.

1516.name: M6C/SOCOM Pistol
1516.description: A pistol with a built-in laser sight, suppressor, and flashlight. Produced by Martian Armory.
